content:
Sure! Here is a sample software development manager resume for a person named Juan Perez from Buenos Aires who is primarily a Java developer with some Python experience:

Juan Perez
Software Development Manager
Buenos Aires, Argentina

Summary:

Highly motivated and experienced Software Development Manager with a strong background in Java development and experience with Python. Proven track record of leading successful software development projects and teams, driving innovation and continuous improvement, and delivering high-quality solutions on time and within budget. Skilled in project management, agile methodologies, and software design and architecture.

Skills:

* Java development
* Python
* Project management
* Agile methodologies
* Software design and architecture
* Team leadership
* Communication and collaboration
* Problem-solving and critical thinking

Experience:

Software Development Manager
ABC Company, Buenos Aires, Argentina (20XX-present)

* Led a team of 15 software developers in the design, development, and delivery of several successful software projects using Java and Python.
* Implemented agile methodologies, including Scrum and Kanban, to improve team productivity and deliver high-quality solutions on time.
* Developed and maintained software design and architecture documentation to ensure that projects were scalable, maintainable, and aligned with business goals.
* Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including product management, QA, and operations, to define and prioritize project requirements and deliverables.
* Mentored and coached team members to help them grow their technical and professional skills.

Senior Software Developer
XYZ Company, Buenos Aires, Argentina (20XX-20XX)

* Contributed to the development of several software projects using Java and Python.
* Worked closely with the development team to design and implement software solutions that met business needs and requirements.
* Participated in code reviews, pair programming, and other software development best practices to ensure high-quality code.

Education:

* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, University of Buenos Aires (20XX-20XX)

Certifications:

* Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
* Certified Java Developer (CJD)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions or need further assistance.
